ax.ha.it.smsalarm

Class PreferencesHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • ax.ha.it.smsalarm.PreferencesHandler

  • public class PreferencesHandler
extends Object
    This class is responsible for all Shared Preferences handling.
    PreferencesHandler is a singleton.
    Since:
    2.0
    Version:
    2.1
    Author:
    Robert Nyholm

      Enumeration for the shared preferences keys.

      • getPrefs

        public Object getPrefs(PreferencesHandler.PrefKeys sharedPreferences,
              PreferencesHandler.PrefKeys key,
              PreferencesHandler.DataTypes type,
              Context context)
                throws IllegalArgumentException
        Method to get values in Shared Preferences. It retrieves different values depending on input parameters. Returns retrieved value if all is fine else an IllegalArgumentsException are thrown.
        Example usage:
        String s = getPrefs(PrefKeys.SHARED_PREF, PrefKeys.ACK_NUMBER_KEY, DataTypes.STRING, this.context), this will retrieve a String from key ACK_NUMBER_KEY and with the given context.
        Parameters:
        sharedPreferences - SharedPreferences from which the values are retrieved from
        key - Key in which Shared Preference is stored
        type - Different type of values is retrieved from Shared Preferences, datatype is decided depending on this given DataType
        context - Context from which the Shared Preferences should be retrieved
        Returns:
        Returns an object with the retrieved values. This object can be an instance of Integer, String, Boolean or a List of Strings
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if an incorrect datatype was given as parameter
        See Also:
        setPrefs(PrefKeys, PrefKeys, Object, Context), getPrefs(PrefKeys, PrefKeys, DataTypes, Context), logCat(LogPriorities, String, String), logCatTxt(LogPriorities, String, String), logCatTxt(LogPriorities, String, String, Throwable)

      • getPrefs

        public Object getPrefs(PreferencesHandler.PrefKeys sharedPreferences,
              PreferencesHandler.PrefKeys key,
              PreferencesHandler.DataTypes type,
              Context context,
              Object defaultObject)
                throws IllegalArgumentException
        Method to get values in Shared Preferences. It retrieves different values depending on input parameters. It's also possible to set default value to retrieve from shared preferences if no value exist, NB. ONLY WORKING FOR DATATYPES Integer, String AND Boolean Returns retrieved value if all is fine else an IllegalArgumentsException are thrown.
        Example usage:
        String s = getPrefs(PrefKeys.SHARED_PREF, PrefKeys.ACK_NUMBER_KEY, DataTypes.STRING, this.context, "empty"), this will retrieve a String from key ACK_NUMBER_KEY and with the given context.
        Parameters:
        sharedPreferences - SharedPreferences from which the values are retrieved from
        key - Key in which Shared Preference is stored
        type - Different type of values is retrieved from Shared Preferences, datatype is decided depending on this given DataType
        context - Context from which the Shared Preferences should be retrieved
        defaultObject - Default value to be retrieved from shared preference if no previous value exist
        Returns:
        Returns an object with the retrieved values. This object can be an instance of Integer, String, Boolean or a List of Strings
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if an incorrect datatype was given as parameter
        See Also:
        setPrefs(PrefKeys, PrefKeys, Object, Context), getPrefs(PrefKeys, PrefKeys, DataTypes, Context, Object), logCat(LogPriorities, String, String), logCatTxt(LogPriorities, String, String), logCatTxt(LogPriorities, String, String, Throwable)

      • setPrefs

        public void setPrefs(PreferencesHandler.PrefKeys sharedPreferences,
            PreferencesHandler.PrefKeys key,
            Object object,
            Context context)
              throws IllegalArgumentException
        Method to set values to Shared Preferences. It sets different values of different instances depending on input parameters.
        Example usage:
        setPrefs(PrefKeys.SHARED_PREF, PrefKey.ACKNUMBER_KEY, "0457 0000 000", this.context
        Parameters:
        sharedPreferences - SharedPreferences from which the values are retrieved from
        key - Key in which Shared Preference is stored
        object - Object to be stored to Shared Preferences, supported instances are Integer, String, Boolean and List
        context - Context from which the Shared Preferences should be retrieved
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if an incorrect datatype was given as parameter
        See Also:
        getPrefs(PrefKeys, PrefKeys, DataTypes, Context), logCat(LogPriorities, String, String)
